html:
B&H Photo has the recently released Apple 14″ MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) for $1799 (Reg $1999) after an instant rebate. This deal likely won't last long. This is a pretty well equipped MacBook Pro and should serve most people well for a long time.

Apple 14″ MacBook Pro

  • Apple M4 Pro 12-Core Chip
  • 24GB Unified RAM | 512GB SSD
  • 14″ 3024 x 1964 Liquid Retina XDR Screen
  • 16-Core GPU | 16-Core Neural Engine
  • Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) | Bluetooth 5.3
  • Thunderbolt 5 | HDMI | MagSafe 3
  • SDXC Slot | 12MP Center Stage Camera
  • Backlit Magic Keyboard
  • Force Touch Trackpad | Touch ID Sensor
  • macOS

Apple 14″ MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) $1799 (Reg $1999)

About the M4 Pro Chip

The M4 Pro chip delivers exceptional single- and multi-thread performance boost with 8 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. 16 GPU cores accelerate rendering times while supporting hardware-accelerated ray tracing for spectacular visuals. Dynamic Cashing optimizes on-chip memory to increase average GPU utilization, boosting the performance of professional applications and games. The integrated Neural Engine features 273 GB/s of memory bandwidth, twice as much bandwidth as any AI PC chip, which accelerates AI workloads.
